alert.note: Alert for Campbell; Crook (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 11 at 7:22PM MDT until July 11 at 8:15PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: The National Weather Service in Rapid City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Campbell County in northeastern Wyoming... West central Crook County in northeastern Wyoming... * Until 815 PM MDT. * At 721 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles northwest of Weston, or 29 miles north of Gillette, moving east at 40 mph. THIS IS A DESTRUCTIVE STORM FOR Weston. HAZARD...Baseball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be severely injured. Expect shattered windows, extensive damage to roofs, siding, and vehicles. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Weston around 735 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Oshoto. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...DESTRUCTIVE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare immediately for large hail and damaging winds. People outside should move immediately to shelter inside a strong building. Stay away from windows.
